name: ax-hvdistr2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), csm, c2), co(co(c0, csm, c2), cva, co(c1, csm, c2))))
comment: Scalar multiplication distributive law. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
